title: IDEAZS premium SaaS landing page (modern, futuristic, high-converting)

requirements.text: Create a single-page marketing landing page for “IDEAZS” with the following sections in order: Hero, Problem Statement, How It Works, Features, Pricing, Final CTA.

quotes:
Create a modern premium SaaS startup website called “IDEAZS”.

Hero Section...
Next Section: Problem Statement...
How It Works Section...
Features Section...
Pricing Section...
Final CTA Section...

acceptanceCriteria: Landing page renders all requested sections in the specified order on the main route.
All user-facing text is in English and matches the provided copy exactly for headlines, subheadlines, section titles, and CTA button labels.
Page is responsive and readable on mobile, tablet, and desktop.

requirements.text: Implement the overall visual theme: minimal, futuristic, premium SaaS look with a dark gradient background (deep navy to black), strong typographic hierarchy, ample whitespace, rounded corners, soft shadows, and glassmorphism cards; use an electric blue or violet glow accent consistently for interactive elements and highlights.

quotes:
Style: Minimal, futuristic, high-converting landing page.
Dark gradient background (deep navy to black).
Clean bold typography with strong hierarchy.
Accent color: electric blue or violet glow.
Lots of white space and smooth spacing.
Rounded corners, soft shadows, glassmorphism cards.

acceptanceCriteria: Background uses a dark gradient (deep navy to black) across the page.
Cards (e.g., features/pricing) use glassmorphism styling (translucent surface + blur) with rounded corners and soft shadows.
Buttons/links/focus states use a consistent electric blue or violet glow accent.
Typography shows clear hierarchy (large hero headline, smaller supporting text, consistent section headings).

requirements.text: Build the Hero section with: headline “Launch Your Idea. Sell in Minutes.”; subheadline “IDEAZS turns your product idea into a stunning, ready-to-share launch page — instantly.”; primary CTA button “Start Your Launch”; secondary button “See How It Works”. Include a subtle animated gradient background or floating light particle effect behind/around the hero for a premium feel.

quotes:
Hero Section:
Large bold headline:
“Launch Your Idea. Sell in Minutes.”

Subheadline:
“IDEAZS turns your product idea into a stunning, ready-to-share launch page — instantly.”

Primary CTA button:
“Start Your Launch”

Secondary button:
“See How It Works”

Add subtle animated gradient background or floating light particles for a premium feel.

acceptanceCriteria: Hero displays the exact headline, subheadline, and both CTA buttons with the exact labels.
Hero background includes a subtle continuous animation (animated gradient and/or floating light particles) that does not obstruct text readability and is performant on mobile.
Primary and secondary CTAs are visually distinct, with hover/focus glow effects consistent with the accent color.

requirements.text: Add the Problem Statement section with title “Ideas Don’t Fail. Launches Do.” and short marketing copy describing how people struggle to launch products due to time, design, and technical barriers.

quotes:
Next Section: Problem Statement
Title: “Ideas Don’t Fail. Launches Do.”
Short marketing text explaining how people struggle to launch products due to time, design, and technical barriers.

acceptanceCriteria: Section displays the exact title provided.
Section includes concise marketing text covering time, design, and technical barriers (all three themes are present).
Spacing and typography match the overall premium theme and remain responsive.

requirements.text: Add a “How It Works” section laid out as 3 columns on desktop (stacked on mobile) with icons and the following steps: “Describe Your Product”, “Choose Your Style”, “Launch Instantly”.

quotes:
How It Works Section (3 columns with icons):

Describe Your Product

Choose Your Style

Launch Instantly

acceptanceCriteria: On desktop widths, the section shows 3 columns; on smaller screens it stacks cleanly.
Each step includes a clear icon and the exact step label.
Icons and cards follow glassmorphism styling and use the accent glow subtly on hover.

requirements.text: Add a Features section using modern feature cards with icons for: “Auto-generated product page”, “Mobile optimized design”, “Built-in conversion layout”, “Shareable launch link”, “Analytics (Pro)”.

quotes:
Features Section:
Modern feature cards with icons:

Auto-generated product page

Mobile optimized design

Built-in conversion layout

Shareable launch link

Analytics (Pro)

acceptanceCriteria: All 5 feature cards render with the exact labels provided.
Each feature card includes an icon and consistent card styling (rounded, soft shadow, glass effect).
Hover states include subtle glow and do not cause layout shift.

requirements.text: Add a Pricing section with 3 clean tier cards: Free, Pro, Elite. Visually highlight the Pro plan with a subtle glow border and/or elevated emphasis while staying consistent with the minimal premium theme.

quotes:
Pricing Section:
Clean 3-tier pricing cards: Free, Pro, Elite
Highlight Pro plan with subtle glow border.

acceptanceCriteria: Pricing section displays three tiers: Free, Pro, Elite.
Pro tier is visually emphasized via a subtle glow border and/or prominence without being distracting.
Cards remain readable on dark gradient background and are responsive (stack on mobile).

requirements.text: Add a Final CTA section with big bold text “Your Idea Deserves to Be Seen.” and a CTA button labeled “Launch with IDEAZS Now”.

quotes:
Final CTA Section:
Big bold text:
“Your Idea Deserves to Be Seen.”
Button: “Launch with IDEAZS Now”

acceptanceCriteria: Final CTA displays the exact headline and button label.
CTA button includes hover/focus glow effects consistent with the chosen accent.
Section has clear visual separation from Pricing and maintains premium spacing.

requirements.text: Implement smooth fade-in scroll animations for major sections and subtle hover glow effects for interactive elements (buttons, cards, links) while keeping transitions smooth and high-end.

quotes:
Smooth fade-in scroll animations and subtle hover glow effects.
...
Smooth transitions. High-end startup feel.

acceptanceCriteria: Each major section fades/slides in as it enters the viewport (no animation spam on tiny elements).
Buttons and cards have subtle glow/brightness changes on hover and visible focus states for keyboard navigation.
Animations remain performant (no noticeable jank on typical devices) and preserve readability.

requirements.text: Wire the Hero CTAs to sensible on-page navigation: “See How It Works” scrolls to the How It Works section; “Start Your Launch” and “Launch with IDEAZS Now” scroll to Pricing or the final CTA area (choose one consistent target and implement smooth scrolling).

quotes:
Primary CTA button:
“Start Your Launch”

Secondary button:
“See How It Works”
...
Button: “Launch with IDEAZS Now”

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking “See How It Works” smoothly scrolls to the How It Works section.
Clicking “Start Your Launch” and “Launch with IDEAZS Now” smoothly scrolls to the chosen target section (Pricing or Final CTA) consistently.
Scrolling behavior works on mobile and does not require a page reload.

constraints: Frontend code must not modify any files under the immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (compose existing UI components instead of editing them).
Do not introduce unsupported technologies (no Next.js, no external databases, no third-party auth beyond Internet Identity, no WebSockets).
nonGoals: Building the actual IDEAZS product flow that generates launch pages (this request is for a marketing/landing page only).
Implementing user authentication, payments, analytics tracking, or dashboards beyond static marketing copy.
